plot: Homer tries to make amends for binging his and Marge's favorite show without her; Bart prepares for "Krusty's Holiday Trample".

Homer angers Marge by watching a binge-worthy TV show on Netflix. Homer secretly enrolls himself in dance classes in order to impress Marge. Meanwhile, Bart and Milhouse compete with each other to get free Krusty merchandise, but they both lose the competition, Ralph ends up winning the free merchandise. Homer finally makes amends with Marge at the dance and she forgives Homer for his thoughtless behavior.—dawsonpersi
